name: MtgDartTools
description: A build task for building and testing Dart packages.
helpMarkDown: Uses build_runner to build packages. Dart packages must be compatible with Dart 2.x.
author: Milestone

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Dart-related action to be ran.

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: Source Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Dart package (should be the directory containing pubspec.yaml).

inputs.name: destinationPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path that will contain the build output.

inputs.name: sdkPath
inputs.label: SDK Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Dart SDK (root directory, not the bin folder).

inputs.name: sdkDestinationPath
inputs.label: SDK Destination Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to download the Dart SDK to (a folder named 'dart-sdk' will be created at this path).

inputs.name: sdkChannel
inputs.label: SDK Channel
inputs.helpMarkDown: Which SDK release channel to use.

inputs.name: sdkVersion
inputs.label: SDK Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Which version of the Dart SDK to download (note: this task will not work with 1.x versions).

inputs.name: sdkPlatform
inputs.label: SDK Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Which platform version of the Dart SDK to download.

inputs.name: sdkArchitecture
inputs.label: SDK Architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Which architecture of the Dart SDK to download.

inputs.name: config
inputs.label: Build Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Which build.yaml file to use. If specified, build_runner will use `build.<name>.yaml`, where `<name>` is the value set here. If left blank, `build.yaml` will be used (if it exists).

inputs.name: release
inputs.label: Release Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the package should be built in release mode.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Verbose Logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether verbose logging should be used.
